first_para: Louise Mensch (née Louise Daphne Bagshawe; born 28 June 1971) is an English author who writes under her maiden name. She was the Conservative Member of the UK Parliament (MP) for Corby from 2010 to 2012.

full.extract: Louise Mensch (née Louise Daphne Bagshawe; born 28 June 1971) is an English author who writes under her maiden name. She was the Conservative Member of the UK Parliament (MP) for Corby from 2010 to 2012.
full.title: Louise Mensch
